project_abstract.cdata: In support of the Government's policy to accelerate development of China's poorer provinces in the north and west, the Xinjiang Agricultural Development Project will expand the irrigated area for crop production, improve pastures and promote livestock development on 20 state farms in Northern Xinjiang.  Specifically, it will construct irrigation works on 32,300 ha to be planted with food, fiber and fodder crops; improve 44,700 ha of rainfed pasture through fertilizing, fencing and seeding; and introduce improved animal breeds.  To handle the increased production of raw materials, the project will construct and equip agroprocessing facilities such as cottonseed oil processing plants, wool processing plants, slaughterhouses and raisin production facilities.  In addition to agroprocessing equipment, the project will provide tractors, combine harvesters, balers, silage equipment, scrapers with laser-control, bulldozers, fuel tankers and refrigerated trunks.  A project-supported training component will be used to train equipment operators, plant managers and workers, and project personnel.

P003490.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>新疆农业开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>为支持中国政府加快华北和西部地区贫困省份发展步伐的政策，本项目将扩大新疆北部20家国营农场农业灌溉面积，改善草场状况，促进畜牧业发展。项目具体内容包括：（1）建设3.23万公顷农田和草场的灌溉工程；（2）通过施肥、搭建围栏和提供种子改善4.47万公顷雨浇草场生产条件；（3）引进改良畜牧品种。为增加原材料生产，项目将建设并装配农产品加工设施，如棉花种子加工厂、羊毛加工厂、屠宰场和葡萄干生产设施。除了提供农产品加工设备外，项目也将提供拖拉机、联合收割机、打包机、切草机、激光控制平地机、推土机、油罐车和冷藏车。项目还将对设备操作人员、工厂管理人员和工人以及项目人员提供培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
